text:
Celebs wish Preity on 41st birthday

Bollywood celebrities such as Karan Johar and Alia Bhatt have wished the “super fun” and “zestful” actor Preity Zinta on her 41st birthday on Sunday.

Actors Dino Morea and Arjun Rampal have wished her a year full of happiness, luck and love.

Preity, who made her Bollywood debut in the 1998 film Dil Se followed it up with a role in Soldier the same year. She received a Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut, and was later recognised for her role as a teenage single mother in the 2000 film Kya Kehna . She received the Filmfare Award for Best Actress in 2003 for Kal Ho Naa Ho . — IANS
title: Celebs wish maddest and dearest Preity on 41st birthday
